author: checknft.io
title: Bring Ethereum NFT users to Cardano
description: CNFTs are popular only inside Ada community because ETH users dont have connections with Cardano NFTs. No tools for side-by-side comparison.
solution: Cardano integration with checkNFT.io service. In a single tool, ETH users will analyse ETH NFTs with CNFTs that will pull adoption from ETH.
experience: 2 Co-Founders of checkNFT.io has 18+ years in IT R&D (6+ years of blockchain R&D), Sales and Business Development (ex-Microsoft, ex-Intel).
